ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark and new stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m assuming the spell list is incomplete, considering there aren t any bard songs on it. ... The levels now take a *lot* longer.  That s what s changed.
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 2 Mar 2000, Kevin L. Crawford wrote:
>
> As I have posted on Concert hall. What _difference_ does it make? They get
> 1 or 2 spells a level instead of 8-10 every 4 or 5 levels? Who cares?
>
> So, after 5 levels they get 10 spells. They already get 10 spells every 5
> levels. What's changed?

I'm assuming the spell list is incomplete, considering there
aren't any bard songs on it.

> We get 1 spell per level, we will get 1 spell per level... again... what's
> changed?

The levels now take a *lot* longer. That's what's changed.
If they follow the one-song-per-level rule, our rate of new
songs *will* be decreased, regardless of what they do with
other classes. Whether the same is true for spellcasting
classes remains to be seen. Dunno how you got class envy out
of that.

--
John H. Kim
